parse: Conjunction
str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.

parse: Noun - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: Bread, a loaf, food. From airo; bread or a loaf.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From eucharistos; to be grateful, i.e. to express gratitude; specially, to say grace at a meal.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To break (in pieces), break bread. A primary verb; to break.

parse: Conjunction
str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Demonstrative Pronoun - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: This; he, she, it.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Noun - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: Body, flesh; the body of the Church. From sozo; the body, used in a very wide application, literally or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.

parse: Preposition
str2: Gen: in behalf of; acc: above.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.

parse: Demonstrative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: This; he, she, it.

parse: Preposition
str2: A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.

parse: Noun - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: A recalling, remembrance, memory. From anamimnesko; recollection.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Feminine 1st Person Singular
str2: My, mine. From the oblique cases of ego; my.
